note:
I love my family, bikes, our dog, bikes, music, bikes, nature, bikes, sports. And bikes, too.

Stubborn optimist, yet cynical at times.
Failed miserably, yet forever trying.
Grumpy, yet good natured.

Team leader of an awesome bunch of bike couriers, more often than not riding myself too.
Lover of bikes in general, but most passionate about nineties mountainbikes, rebuilding them in to fully capable do-it-all fun machines as a hobby.
Meanwhile trying to be the best family man I can be.

name: Awesome nineties mtb's brought back to life!
